name: Wizhood
description: We can not leave this uncertainty that the cruel King Fowke had done against us. We should kill Fowke with the help of the Underground King !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 256 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space
